meanings.definition: A system of transportation using a suspended carriage or bucket.
meanings.sent1: The telpher carried goods across the factory.
meanings.sent2: The telpher system efficiently moved materials from one building to another.
meanings.sent3: The telpher had a mind of its own and decided to take a joyride around the warehouse.
meanings.sent4: The telpher glided through the air like a graceful bird, transporting its precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The telpher hummed softly as it zipped along the cables, a silent worker in the bustling factory.

meanings.definition: To transport or convey using a telpher system.
meanings.sent1: They telphered the heavy crates effortlessly with the new system.
meanings.sent2: We will telpher the supplies to the construction site tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The workers telphered the equipment with such speed that they almost beat the delivery truck.
meanings.sent4: She telphered her thoughts across to him, hoping he would understand her perspective.
meanings.sent5: The telphering process made the task of moving furniture seem like a breeze.
